channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Desktop and Workstation systems
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Desktop and Workstation systems

item.title: CVE-2020-8353|2024-08-04T09:56:28.333Z -- lenovo -- desktop%20and%20workstation%20systems
item.description: Prior to August 10, 2020, some Lenovo Desktop and Workstation systems were shipped with the Embedded Host Based Configuration (EHBC) feature of Intel AMT enabled. This could allow an administrative user with local access to configure Intel AMT.
